mapper.select: SELECT id, name, password, roles FROM user WHERE id = #{userId}

SELECT id, STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', modify_time) AS modifyTime, name, IFNULL(roles, '') AS roles FROM user
ORDER BY modify_time DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (create_time, modify_time, name, password, roles) VALUES (datetime(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'localtime'), datetime(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'localtime'), #{username}, #{password}, #{roles})
